title: Game Scoop Episode 640
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Tina Amini, and Kat Bailey -- are discussing Halo Infinite and Horizon Forbidden West release dates, Marvel Midnight Suns, Saints Row, and more.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Tina Amini, and Kat Bailey -- are discussing Halo Infinite and Horizon Forbidden West release dates, Marvel Midnight Suns, Saints Row, and more.
